title: Does anyone know what font this is?
content:
[http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii170/karlauggie/blog2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017035224/http:/i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii170/karlauggie/blog2.jpg "http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii170/karlauggie/blog2.jpg")

I am trying to find out what font the "2 peas" part is. I know it has been around for at least 45 years. My dad has a clay sculpture he made with this exact font pressed into it. The star is part of the font and the other numbers are swirly too. This is the only sample I could find. I think it is also a popular font for things in art museum gift shops.
author: MattS311
